strategies.name: Adaptive Kelly
strategies.description: Momentum: Kelly sizing, bets min 3-5 & 8-10 WITH trend

strategies.name: Volatility Regime
strategies.description: Momentum: HIGH vol=ride trend, LOW vol=wait for breakout

strategies.name: RSI Divergence
strategies.description: Momentum: hunts divergences, follows momentum if none

strategies.name: Market Arbitrage
strategies.description: Momentum: bets when our prob estimate differs >10% from market

strategies.name: Ensemble Consensus
strategies.description: Momentum: combines 4 signals, bets when 3+ agree

strategies.name: Fade the Move
strategies.description: Anti-momentum: bets AGAINST >0.12% moves after min 5

strategies.name: Bayesian Updater
strategies.description: Anti-momentum: accumulates evidence, bets when >65% confident

strategies.name: Time-Decay Reversal
strategies.description: Anti-momentum: ignores early noise, fades late extremes

strategies.name: Breakout Confirmation
strategies.description: Confirmed momentum: only bets on trends >70% retained

strategies.name: Kelly Fractional
strategies.description: V1 survivor: optimal bet sizing using 25% Kelly

strategies.name: Regime Detection
strategies.description: V1 WINNER: adapts to trending vs choppy markets

strategies.name: EV Maximizer
strategies.description: V1 survivor: only bets when EV is strongly positive

strategies.name: Ultra Conservative
strategies.description: Control: waits until min 12, tiny bets only

strategies.name: Random Baseline
strategies.description: Control: 50/50 coin flip at min 5, $10 bet

strategies.name: Scaled Betting
strategies.description: Original V1: timed bets at min 1,4,7,10 - $5,$10,$15,$10
